## BaseTextureNode.(constructor)

Creates a new texture node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```

## Remarks

Initializes with default sampling parameters: - Auto-generated unique parameter name - Clamp addressing mode - Nearest filtering (point sampling) - No mipmap filtering - Empty texture ID
